game.name: Castle Defense
game.description:
This time a horde of highly dangerous and terrifying enemies has attacked on your castle and you have do not any choice but fighting against them to get your freedom back again! Hey man! You are not alone in this relentless battle against a group of blood-thirsty souls. Grab your gun, clear all of them and show off the world that you are a brave soldier of your country in Castle Defense! Choose your team, and character before entering the first stage in this brand new adventure game!

Try to clear the waves of enemies as fast as you can to clear the present level and move to the advanced level! Grab all the coins you see along the way and use them to purchase some special power-ups like poison, fireballs and magical staffs in this one of the best war games! Keep the evil forces away from your castle by using all the magical spells in your power timely! Different types of unknown dangerous and scary monsters keep attacking you so be careful until you finish all of them!

Do not forget to change the formation continuously to block these monsters! Guide your soldiers to find out the weakness of your all monsters and beat them to win the fight each time! Command your soldiers through all the stages and prove yourself as a true warrior in this tower defense game! Feel free to play battle games for free online on atmegame.com and allow you to be the biggest fighter of this planet, no download required!
